name: Glimpse of hope
description:
{CPES 2022} All the code & art were made during the jam :3 Theme: 

You slip into the role of a character made of letters, struggling to make your way through a broken and dark world.

Note:

On macOs safari, in webgl u can't hear the game unless u press the game screen at least once.

Gamplay:

Glimpse of hope is a puzzle platformer. Despite your small stature you have a powerful gift: You can craft words which will have an effect on the environment. But choose your words wisely - they can either be a blessing... or a curse!

Controls  Click [R] to restart Tap space bar twice to double jump Arrow keys for movement: [W] [A][S][D] Make sure to have sound on and enjoy :D
